mapper.insert:
insert into vaccine_station_rel
id,
vaccine_id,
vaccine_station_id,
next_vaccine_id,
vaccine_name,
minium_age,
last_time_interval,
create_time,
create_by,
update_time,
will_vaccine_name,
next_vaccine_minium_age,
next_last_time_interval,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{vaccineId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{vaccineStationId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{nextVaccineId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{vaccineName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{miniumAge,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{lastTimeInterval,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{willVaccineName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{nextVaccineMiniumAge,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{next_last_time_interval,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.select: SELECT vsr.next_vaccine_id nextVaccineId,vbi.birthday,vi.last_time_vaccine lastTimeVaccine,vi.last_time_vaccine lastTimeVaccine, vs.work_date workDate,vs.name vaccineStationName,vi.minium_age miniumAge,vsr.will_vaccine_name willVaccineName, vsr.next_vaccine_minium_age nextVaccineMiniumAge,vbi.baby_name babyName,vbi.baby_seed_number babySeedNumber,vi.id vaccineInfoId, vi.name vaccineInfoName,vsr.next_last_time_interval nextLastTimeInterval from vaccine_station_rel vsr INNER JOIN vaccine_baby_info vbi on vsr.vaccine_station_id = vbi.vaccine_station_id INNER JOIN vaccine_info vi on vi.id = vsr.vaccine_id INNER JOIN vaccine_station vs on vs.id = vsr.vaccine_station_id where vi.id = #{QRCode} and vbi.sys_user_id = #{openId} GROUP BY vbi.sys_user_id
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO vaccine_station_rel(vaccine_id, vaccine_station_id, next_vaccine_id, vaccine_name, minium_age, last_time_interval, create_time,will_vaccine_name, next_vaccine_minium_age,next_last_time_interval) VALUES
(#{item.vaccineId}, #{item.vaccineStationId}, #{item.nextVaccineId}, #{item.vaccineName}, #{item.miniumAge}, #{item.lastTimeInterval}, now(), #{item.willVaccineName}, #{item.nextVaccineMiniumAge}, #{item.nextLastTimeInterval} )
